bibl.title: The Organisation of Public Land in Roman Egypt.
L'agriculture institutionnelle en Égypte ancienne: état de la question et perspectives interdisciplinaires
bibl.author: ROWLANDSON, Jane

bibl.note: Introduction. - What did the public land consist of? - Its terms of tenure. - The social organisation of agriculture on public land. - Conclusion: the economics of public land. - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: ROWLANDSON Jane, The Organisation of Public Land in Roman Egypt.
Juan Carlos MORENO GARCÍA (Éd.), L'agriculture institutionnelle en Égypte ancienne: état de la question et perspectives interdisciplinaires = CRIPEL 25 (2005) pp. 173-196.
